667900.name: Brave
667900.description:
The game is a MOD game, a MOD, a play, in a game you can experience different games, such as RPG, shooting, action, racing, and so on
For the time being, only the main scene, game mod: Guardian goddess (single machine), night struggle (multiplayer melee).
The following is an introduction to the existing MOD:
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Guardian goddess (stand alone PVE):
Background: Demons invade this planet. As a brave man, you need to protect the planet, the last base of the goddess, people need you.
RPG comes with the concept of some action games, but not many. For example, you can roll around. The main thing is RPG, such as: equipment synthesis, tasks, Daguai upgrades, etc., there is no attack lock, more freedom a little bit
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Night fight NightFight (multiplayer game PVP):
Background: in the night of the island, opened a race, you and other brave to enter the arena. Who will be the real brave?
The first person FPS is not FPS, the concept is not the same, homemade play. In the dark forest, and see the road is not open the flashlight, the flashlight may be found and killed. Well, the same meaning.
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Finally, I'm developing more gameplay, and if you have better ideas or comments about current gameplay and bug, please let me know in the community.

该游戏是MOD游戏,一个MOD一个玩法,在一个游戏上就可以可以体验不同的游戏,比如RPG,射击,动作,赛车等等等.
暂时只有主场景，游戏mod：守护女神（单机），黑夜斗争（多人混战）。

语言暂时只有英文,虽然没几个单词,但并不是我不想翻译,因为越多语言其实对我的好处更大.
真正原因是在技术上实现更换语言的难度太大,真的不是我不想翻译,是实在解决不了,但我会继续研究这个问题.

以下是现有的MOD介绍:
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
守护女神（单机PVE）：
背景:恶魔入侵这个星球，作为一个勇者,你要保护这个星球,守卫的最后一个女神基地，人们需要你。

RPG带有一些动作游戏的概念,但并不多.比如可以翻滚无敌.主要还是RPG的内容,如:装备合成,任务,打怪升级等.没有攻击锁定,更自由一点点吧.
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
黑夜斗争NightFight（多人游戏PVP）：
背景:在永夜的小岛,开启了一场竞赛，你和其他勇者进入了这个竞技场。谁将是真正的勇者？

第一人称FPS,也不能算是FPS,概念不太一样,自创的玩法.在一片漆黑的森林里面,不打开手电筒又看不清路,打开手电筒又可能被别人发现然后打死.嗯,差不多是这个意思.
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
最后,我正在开发更多的游戏玩法，如果你对当前的游戏玩法和bug有更好的想法或评论，请在社区里面告诉我。
